Gaming/Hobbies

I usually spend my free time playing video games or reading. I always enjoy exploring fantasy and medieval worlds because they intrigue me the most. This has led me to fall in love with the Mount & Blade video game franchise.

Eve Online is a far cry from a medieval game, but it's another game that I thoroughly enjoy. (For anyone out there that plays the game, I'm a Providence resident.)

I am also the team captian of the Overwatch team at Neumont, Team Immutable. We are an average of a 3k team and are working to help bring mroe Esports to Neumont.

I can easily drone on and on about those games in particular and why I enjoy them, but who would ever actually read all of that. If for some reason you would like to hear my opinions on these or other games, feel free to reach out to me via the HOW TO REACH ME page.
